subject: A Shot Through the Dark Collection Preorder
content:
Dear reader

My name is Cathlene Ross and I wanted to first thank you for being apart of my early book club and supporting me for voer 5 years. I wanted to let you know that me and the team at Ross publishing are releasing the full collection of our heavily award book 3 part series A Shot Through the Dark on November 15th 2025 for $80. As we have a limited supply Preorders will be going live tomorow through the month of April and only avalible to our email subscribers. The first 100 will get a complementary signature and a map of the city of Everdark.

Go to our website at www.RossPub.com then enter Code ASTDCP to place your preorder today.

Thank you for your support

Cathlene Ross
